page.title: 18Food at a Busy Village Pub.
page.content: Mrs. Anne Parr has lived at the Greendale Oak ,Cuckney,for 30 years having taken over as tenant following the death of her husband.She has staff working behind the bar but works very hard herself preparing and cooking the food which is to be served at lunchtimes and evenings either as bar snacks or as full meals in the Dining Room. Typical bar snacks on sale are:_ Scampi ,Chips and Peas _Â£2.00 Gammon cobs _Â£0.70 Beefburger Chips and Salad _Â£1.50 Fish Chips and Peas _Â£2.00 Soup of the day _Â£0.50 The pub gets very busy at lunchtime and most of the meals are sold to people working in or passing through the area. Dining Room meals are usually 3 or 4 courses and cost around Â£6.50.
